item.title: Advanced Rails Filter Parameter Logging
item.description: Have you ever wondered why you might see the while debugging your rails application? Maybe you expect to see for that new being sent to aâ€¦
item.content:encoded: Have you ever wondered why you might see the [FILTERED] while debugging your rails application? Maybe you expect to see [FILTERED] for that new super_secret_param being sent to a newly created endpoint? Eitherway, this is the configuration option filter_parameter_logging at work.
